titleStmt.title: Urania, or A description of the painting of the top of the theater at Oxon as the artist lay'd his design. By Ro. Whitehall, fellow of Merton Colledge. Licensed and entred according to order.
titleStmt.author: Whitehall, Robert, 1625-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Ratcliffe and Thomas Daniel, and are to be sold by them at their house in Newstreet betwixt Shooe-lane and Fetter-lane,

notesStmt.note: With a dedication to the Chancellor of Oxford, James, Duke of Ormond, on pp. 8-9.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.

place.placeName: their house in Newstreet betwixt Shooe-lane
